TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 1st Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: For we are strangers on the earth, as were all our fathers; keep our short life without sin, O our Savior, and have mercy on us, as the lover of mankind.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Attend unto the voice of my supplication,
O my king and my God.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Unto my words give ear, O Lord; hear my cry.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: O Lord, rebuke me not in Thine anger.
and rejoice in him with trembling.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Have mercy on me, O Lord, for I am weak.
